Conditions.Mandatory: 1st floor portion at rear of structure

Qualifiers.Applicability: Structures 75' from front lot line and 20' from street-side lot line
1st floor balconies, uncovered porches, stairways, and fire escapes
Eaves & cornices, bay/greenhouse windows, uncovered parking, pools & spas, fireplaces
Main dwelling portion no wider than half the max. width of the dwelling

Exceptions.Special cases: Only once in the life of the structure
